article_summary:
Yes, I know that single-payer healthcare systems succeed in other developed nations.
I also know that competitive insurance-based healthcare systems succeed elsewhere.
Single-payer healthcare will fail just as badly.
It is failing all of us, since we pay twice as much for healthcare as we would pay in other developed countries.
It will fail millions who pay high prices for treatment they don't need.
